sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YETA3150 ( EDAC_DTNU , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RSNO_NUMB , FMAC_GBCD , EDAC_OTAM ,GUKS_YENO ) VALUES ( #edacDtnu# , #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #rsnoNumb# , #fmacGbcd# , #edacOtam# , #guksYeno# )

INSERT INTO YETA3150 ( EDAC_DTNU , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RSNO_NUMB , FMAC_GBCD , EDAC_OTAM ,GUKS_YENO) VALUES ( (SELECT (NVL(MAX(EDAC_DTNU),0) + 1) AS EDAC_DTNU FROM YETA3150 AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND AA.SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# ) , #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #rsnoNumb# , #fmacGbcd# , #edacOtam# , #guksYeno# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YETA3150 SET EDAC_DTNU=#edacDtnu# , EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# , SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# , DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , RSNO_NUMB=#rsnoNumb# , FMAC_GBCD=#fmacGbcd# , EDAC_OTAM=#edacOtam# ,GUKS_YENO= #guksYeno# WHERE EDAC_DTNU=#edacDtnu# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YETA3150 WHERE EDAC_DTNU=#edacDtnu# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
DELETE FROM YETA3150 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

DELETE FROM YETA3150 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT EDAC_DTNU , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY ,RSNO_NUMB , FMAC_GBCD , EDAC_OTAM ,GUKS_YENO FROM YETA3150 WHERE EDAC_DTNU=#edacDtnu# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT EDAC_DTNU , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RSNO_NUMB , FMAC_GBCD , EDAC_OTAM ,GUKS_YENO FROM YETA3150 WHERE 1=1
EDAC_DTNU = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY EDAC_DTNU DESC , EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3150 WHERE 1=1
EDAC_DTNU = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
